name: Modern Minesweeper (theflyingwurst)
description:
This is a recreation of the famous Minesweeper game.

It has:

  • A dark and modern design
  • It is fully customizable
  • It support Xtremely big boards (picture 3 has a 80 by 60 board)
  • Counts the time it takes you to finish
  • Shows you your progress
  • Shows the number of estimated remaining bombs
